title: Rune Pages
body: No option to buy new rune pages. It just doesn't exist on the new client. In order to buy new rune pages you have to go to the old client.

replies.body:
Hey there, buddy! 
It's simple. Go to Gameplay where you see the runes to buy and (left side) switch from tier 3 to show all. That might get fixed.

Hope that worked ;)
The one place I didn't think to look of course lol. Thank you for letting me know! I think that they should be at the top of the page all the time. I don't see why they should be hidden.
